liaise.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to exchange information with someone who works in another organization or department so that you can both be more effective
liaise.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Council officers are liaising closely with local groups.
The education officer liaises between students, schools and colleges.
liaise.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to make sure that information is passed between people, departments, or organizations so that they can work effectively
liaise.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: You should liaise with other staff on training provision.
